preparations.content: Place sugar in mixing bowl and grind <b>5 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add lime and peppermint then chop <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>.
Add rum and mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>. Insert simmering basket, hold it in place with spatula and strain mojito into glass. Empty mixing bowl.
Place ice cubes in mixing bowl and crush <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Add crushed ice to glass and serve immediately.
